text: The Open Tarragona Costa Daurada is a tennis tournament held in Tarragona, Spain since 2006. The event is part of the ATP Challenger Tour and is played on outdoor clay courts. ==Past finals== ===Singles=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champion !width="200"|Runner-up !width="125"|Score |- | 2010 || Marcel Granollers || Jaroslav Pospíšil || 1–6, 7–5, 6–0 |- | 2009 || Daniel Gimeno-Traver || Paolo Lorenzi || 6–4, 6–0 |- |2008 || Alberto Martín || Simon Greul || 6–7, 6–4, 6–4 |- |2007 || Alberto Martín || Peter Luczak || 6–4, 7–5 |- |2006 || Paolo Lorenzi || Younes El Aynaoui || 6–4, 7–6 |} ===Doubles=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champion !width="200"|Runner-up !width="125"|Score |- | 2010 | Guillermo Olaso Pere Riba | Pablo Andújar Gerard Granollers-Pujol | 7–6(1), 4–6, [10–5] |- | 2009 | Tomasz Bednarek Mateusz Kowalczyk | Flavio Cipolla Alessandro Motti | 6–1, 6–1 |- | 2008 | Dušan Karol Daniel Köllerer | Marc Fornell Marc López | 6–2, 6–2 |- | 2007 | Marcel Granollers Santiago Ventura | Pablo Andújar Daniel Muñoz-de la Nava | 6–4, 7–6 |- | 2006 | Hugo Armando Gabriel Trujillo-Soler | Álex López Morón Santiago Ventura | 6–3, 7–6 |} == External links == *Official website *ITF search Category:ATP Challenger Tour Category:Defunct tennis tournaments in Spain Tarra
title: Open Tarragona Costa Daurada
